relatedNos._zh_Gloss: 利乏音谷, 利乏音人

vocabInfos.mediumDef:
People descended from Repha(?), first mentioned at Gen.14.5
Another name of re.pha.im (רְפָאִים "Rephaim" H7497B)
§ Zamzummims = "plotters"
the Ammonite name for the people who by others were called Rephaim, and were described as a numerous nation of giants; perhaps the same as 'Zuzim'
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
散送冥 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "陰謀者"
亞捫人對利乏音人的稱呼, 其意思是表示一個巨人的大國; 可能和蘇西
(Zuzim, <02104>)指的相同 (申2:20)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
散送冥 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "阴谋者"
亚扪人对利乏音人的称呼, 其意思是表示一个巨人的大国; 可能和苏西
(Zuzim, <02104>)指的相同 (申2:20)
